sqlMap.statement:
SELECT $colNm$ GET_COLUMN FROM $tblNm$ A WHERE A.$glblCmpyCol$ = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND UPPER(A.$whereCol$) = UPPER(#whereVal#)
AND $addWhere$

SELECT DM.MDL_DESC_TXT FROM MDL_NM MN , DS_MDL DM WHERE MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MN.T_MDL_NM = #mdlNm# AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD = DM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND MN.T_MDL_ID = DM.MDL_ID AND DM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT
MN.T_MDL_NM
MN.T_MDL_ID
FROM MDL_NM MN WHERE MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MN.T_MDL_ID = #mdlVal#
AND MN.T_MDL_NM = #mdlVal#
